entry.title: Logic Operators
entry.summary: Read about [propositional logic](../docs/logic/intro): the [operators](../docs/logic/props) and [Boolean algebra](../docs/logic/boolean). Do some of the exercises (TBD).

entry.title: First Day
entry.summary: The first day will just be making introductions and going over the syllabus. There will also be an introduction to ... <!--truncate--> [FoCSipedia](https://bhoward.github.io/focsipedia/)!
